name: How to become a gentleman
body:
## Screen Shots:
![Screenshot1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moderndelta137/moderndelta137.github.io/master/assets/images/projects/Gentleman_1.png)
![Screenshot2](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moderndelta137/moderndelta137.github.io/master/assets/images/projects/Gentleman_3.png)
![Screenshot3](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moderndelta137/moderndelta137.github.io/master/assets/images/projects/Gentleman_2.png)

## Features:
+ Unity 2D FTG game.
+ Self-made textures.
+ Two playable characters: The Gentleman and The Evil Snowman.
+ Support two-player play.
+ 3 different game modes.

## Instructions:
In most of my other projects I played the role of a programmer. So in this project I decided to step out of my comfort zone and try to be an artist. So I kept the game design as simple as possible and let others do the programming. Instead I was responsible for the artworks. Including UI design, animation and texture. Limited by both time and equipment, I wasn't able to make a lot of assests, but it turns out to be fine. The game was designed for a Christmas event, it's fun to play with friends.

###To play the demo: 
Download the .rar and unzip.

Press Enter to Start.

1P: 
+ W-A-S-D to Move.
+ Right_Shift to Attack/Confirm.
+ Right_Control to Dodge(When using the Gentleman)

2P:
+ Arrow Keys to Move.
+ Left_Shift to Attack/Confirm.
+ Left_Control to Dodge(When using the Gentleman)

###To view the source code: 
Download the project folder and open with Unity.(Require Unity 5.2.2 or higher)
